# Preface {.unnumbered}

This website serves as a digital companion for TJ students taking the RS1 class. Materials and format here are heavily inspired and borrowed from @kane2022 and @starnes_yates_moore_2012 .

Almost everything else was written by Mr. Ng and Mr. McFee.
